channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chipotle CEO says ‘generous portions’ will become standard after people blasted its skimpy serving sizes on social media
item.description: Brian Niccol said roughly 10% of Chipotle’s restaurants are outliers in terms of portion sizes.

item.title: Lineage begins trading in the market's largest IPO of 2024
item.description: Lineage, the largest temperature-controlled warehouse REIT in the world, rose by as much as 5% after going public under the ticker symbol "LINE."

item.title: The stock market’s cruel summer is about to get much worse
The ultra-rich are scooping up mansions while almost no one else can afford a typical home
item.description: Luxury-home prices rose more than twice as fast as non-luxury homes, and still their sales jumped compared to typical homes, according to Redfin.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Ford, Viking Therapeutics, ServiceNow and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Royal Caribbean's CEO explains why demand for cruises remains so strong
The 10 best prepaid debit cards you can get without a credit score
item.description: No checking account? No problem. These prepaid debit cards let you add funds and swipe to pay without a ton of fees.

item.title: An opportunity may be emerging in this beaten-down potato stock. Using options to capitalize
item.description: The Idaho-based supplier of frozen potato, sweet potato, appetizer and vegetable products said earnings fell more than 70% from the year-earlier period.

item.title: Buy the dip on Nvidia and other chip stocks? Not quite yet, says this analyst.
Biles, Osaka, Richardson Olympic comebacks highlight issues facing people like them: ‘We’re still asking a lot of Black women athletes’
item.description: They've all bounced back to the world's biggest stage while displaying different levels of vulnerability.

item.title: Ford shares, on pace for worst day since 2009, lead autos rout after company's disappointing earnings
item.description: Shares of Ford were off by more than 17% in early trading Thursday – on pace for their worst decline since 2009.

item.title: This bond-market signal of impending recessions went on a wild ride
Department of Homeland Security to use robot dogs in raids
Trump says Elon Musk 'never told me' he would pledge $45 million a month to campaign
item.description: Elon Musk endorsed Donald Trump before Joe Biden announced he would withdraw his reelection bid, making Kamala Harris the de facto Democratic nominee.

item.title: 20 value stocks scoring highest for long term returns on invested capital
